name: TeraCode
overview:
TeraCode provides offshore development services to established and emerging technology companies in the web application, client-server and mobile markets.

TeraCode specializes in developing high-end custom applications, rapid prototyping and component architecture.

Having almost 200 skilled developers in a range of technologies including Java, .NET, PHP, Ruby, HTML, iPhone, Android, J2ME and more, TeraCode’s core strength is the ability to quickly assimilate project requirements and specifications, rapidly deploy a team of highly capable programmers and leverage an Agile development methodology to get results as soon as possible.

Started in 2005 to leverage the knowledge and expertise gained from over 20 years of working with offshore software vendors, the directors at TeraCode believe they have discovered the right mix of process, communication and methodology to ensure offshore development success. TeraCode is their vision for making offshoring a viable, repeatable and dependable option for businesses.
